family_offices.name: DNS Capital

recent_activities.headline: LaForce Is Acquired by DNS
recent_activities.description: LaForce, LLC was recently acquired by DNS Capital in partnership with LaForce senior management. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
recent_activities.full_text: LaForce, LLC (LaForce) was recently acquired by DNS Capital (DNS) in partnership with LaForce senior management. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

recent_activities.headline: IMIDomics Closes $16.5 Million Series A Financing
recent_activities.description: The round was led by DNS Capital with additional investment from Bristol Myers Squibb and others.
recent_activities.full_text: IMIDomics™ closes $16.5 million Series A financing to advance its precision discovery platform for immune-mediated inflammatory diseases. The round was led by DNS Capital with additional investment from Bristol Myers Squibb, The Pritzker Organization, Tao Capital and others.

recent_activities.headline: FSG acquires controlling interest in Penguins
recent_activities.description: The deal is subject to approval by the NHL Board of Governors and is expected to close before the end of the year.
recent_activities.full_text: The deal, which is subject to approval by the National Hockey League (NHL) Board of Governors, is expected to close before the end of the year. It marks a significant investment by DNS Capital in the sports sector.

key_transactions.description: Acquired by DNS Capital in partnership with LaForce senior management.
DNS Capital leads a Series A financing round.

family_offices.strategy_insights: DNS Capital focuses on a long-term, flexible investment approach across sectors such as healthcare and technology, balancing control and minority investments.
family_offices.leadership_changes: Michael A. Pucker serves as CEO, with several other key leadership positions filled by experienced executives in various fields.
